product_name: Dale of Norway Reindeer Hat - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Dale of Norway Reindeer hat features moisture-wicking Norwegian wool fabric with a warm merino wool lining to keep your head warm and comfortable during cold-weather outings. Earflaps with tassles keep your ears warm. Closeout.
short_description: The Dale of Norway Reindeer hat features moisture-wicking Norwegian wool fabric with a warm merino wool lining to keep your head warm and comfortable during cold-weather outings.
